column2: A merchant appears before you offering you a cure for all ailments including infertility. He offers you this panacea for a paltry compensation.
Now owning the potion you drank it, although the fact that merchant have already left your court without so much as word do your suspicion.
Wait for effects of the potion
After waiting patienlty for potion to take effect you suddenlty felt... you don't know how to descibe it.
After waiting patienlty for potion to take effect nothing happened.
You have gotten your hands on a book that contains instructions for a ritual supposed to cure infertility. The book is quite old and bound in black leather, the title reads "Ponape Scripture"
Somehow this book doesn't feel right.
The ritual fills you with energy - you feel alive and vibrant, you have no doubt that you are no longer plagued by infetility.
The ritual fills you with energy - you can't describe it, it seeps into your mind clouding your judgment...
The ritual fills you with energy - you can't describe it, it seeps into your mind whispering you things.
A rumor has reached your ears about an alchemist who have created a potion that could cure infertility.

After searching for the alchemist far and wide you have finally found him. The alchemist explained that although the is finished potion it is untested, he did pay a wicher some while ago to test the potion and report back to him when he will be in areabut he hasn't heard of witcher ever since...
If a witcher couldn't stomach I doubt I will.
Some time have passed since you drank the potion, although you can't feel any changes you get the feeling the potion actually did work.
After drinking the potion you start feeling sick. Seems like the potion didn't work.
Searching for ways to heal infertility have lead you to a safe albeit expensive procedure.
You don't remeber much of the treatment you went through, but you are confident it works.
